name: Kuba's Basics Unreal Remake Early Pre-Prototype
name_original: Kuba's Basics Unreal Remake Early Pre-Prototype
description:
This is a very super duper early demo with very little content. The android version will be released later when more content will be introduced. 

Press "~" to enable developer console,

use "summon" + BP_[object]_C to summon the object. This is PC only and pressing "esc" will result in quitting the demo.

This second version shows a tiny bit of AI and interactions such as opening doors or chasing the player.
